problem_text:
Let Γ be a finite non-oriented graph on the set of vertices {x1, . . . , xn} and let SΓ = ⟨x1, . . . , xn | xixj = xjxi ⇔(xi, xj) ∈Γ; A2⟩be a presentation of a partially commutative metabelian group SΓ in the variety of all metabelian groups. Is the universal theory of the group SΓ decidable?
V. N. Remeslennikov, E. I. Timoshenko
